summary: As a woman struggles to come to grips with her past in the wake of her mother's death and the disappearance of her sister, an unsettling presence emerges in her childhood home.
cast: Caity Lotz|Kathleen Rose Perkins|Haley Hudson|Sam Ball|Mark Steger|Agnes Bruckner|Casper Van Dien|Dakota Bright|Petra Wright|Sam Zuckerman|Anjini Taneja Azhar|Rachael Kahne|Boriana Williams|Bo Barrett|Jeffrey T Ferguson|Santiago Segura|Ho-Kwan Tse
keywords: hair tied to something|motorcycle riding|hidden room|barefoot woman|close up of eye
title: El pacto
